name: Zorbie
description:
Zorbie gets out of prison, and he’s hungry.
Help-him hunt some birds with his axe, throw it in the sky, let it bump on those damn fowls but avoid breaking your face with it when it falls down.
Zorbie is a title between the block breaker and shmup genres, a kind of modern powered-up Game&Watch freely inspired by 90s arcade games.

Features :
• A super loser hero
• 6 freaky different levels
• 7 dumb huge bosses
• 30 Power Ups (including 9 weapons to unlock)
• 75 missions
• Online leaderboards via Game Center
• Police, birds, witches, sorcerers, asteroids and flying mustaches
